CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 29, 1957, pg. 6 reads: " 'Lean, Clean, Mirror Sharp' - Hamburg Brothers, Inc., 213 Galveston Ave., Pittsburgh 12, are proud of their new line of RCA-Victor radio, hi-fi and television sets. Shown inspecting their wares are, left to right; Carl Hamburg, vice president in charge of sales, and Ralph W. Will, vice president, RCA-Victor division.  "Miss Lean, Clean and Mirror Sharp" (Marcene Sanfran) typifies the advertising slogan. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Hamburg Brothers vice presidents Carl Hamburg and Ralph W. Will, and "Miss Lean, Clean and Mirror Sharp" Marcene Sanfran, posed around RCA Victor television during press review of new RCA Victor line
